txt.en: Aiding the Dispossessed: Feeding the Cold
Deliver the firewood and berries to Enkárvo
The camps of the Easterling refugees are east and across the river from Dale.\n\nYou should help the refugees by gathering firewood and blue berries for them.
Enkárvo can be found in the Dorwinion camp, east and across the river from Dale.\n\nYou should bring the berries and firewood you gathered back to Enkárvo.

'It is challenging enough to manage the needs of Dale, but I continue to hear reports of failing fires and food-stores among the refugees of Rhûn.

'They have grown fond of the berries that grow nearby, and there is plenty of wood to be harvested for a warm fire. I would ask that you assist them in their efforts to gather both.

'Aid them in collecting as much as you are able, and perhaps they shall sleep free of worry for a night.'
The Easterling refugee encampments need more food and firewood than they can gather.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>
'You have done so much for us. Your help and humility are beyond reckoning, [placeholder]!'
